headline: Goldman Sachs upgrades Ralph Lauren on brand momentum and margin expansion
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs upgraded Ralph Lauren Corp (NYSE:RL) to “Buy” from “Neutral,” saying the stock’s recent volatility presents an opportunity to invest in a high-quality brand with long-term earnings power and free cash flow at an attractive valuation.

headline: Grab Holdings, PepsiCo, Ralph Lauren: Trending Tickers
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith reviews several of this morning's top stock stories, including Grab Holdings' (GRAB) reported acquisition attempt of GoTo Group, Barclays' downgrade of PepsiCo (PEP) stock, and Goldman Sachs' upgrade of fashion brand Ralph Lauren (RL). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
